pages.text: $(li)The Wildfire is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blaze$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/fortress)Nether Fortresses$(/l) and randomly over the Nether.$(br)$(li)It has more health, more armor and deals more damage than this last one.$(br)$(li)It can put up shields to become invulnerable for a short period of time.
It may drop a $(l:patchouli:armors/wildfire_helmet)Wildfire Helmet$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/outvoted/shattered_wildfire_piece)Shattered Blaze Piece$(/l) upon death.
